import { SecurityService } from "./../services/security.service"; import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { Location } from "@angular/common"; @Component({ selector: "app-navbar", templateUrl: "./navbar.component.html", styleUrls: ["./navbar.component.scss"], }) export class NavbarComponent { constructor(public secService: SecurityService, private location: Location) {} handleLogout() { this.secService.logout(); } handleBack() { this.location.back(); } handleLogin() { this.secService.login(); } }
